name: Studio Portrait Voucher
description:
THIS OFFER INCLUDES:

ONE FULL PHOTO-SHOOT, with full groups, sub groups and individuals at our studio on Dawson Road, Gladstone. 
    + 
A PERSONAL PREVIEW of your images, approximately one week later.
    + 
ONE 12” x 8” PRINT (approx. A4) or $50 off your portrait order.
    +
YOUR VERY OWN APP, for smartphone or tablet, with 12 of your portraits.


Unless you select our gift presentation pack option (remember, portrait vouchers make great presents), your voucher will be emailed to you and must be used within 6 months.



WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT THIS OFFER
Awards-winning photographer William Debois will capture loads of fun and creative images in a relaxed and playful way. Some people simply don't like being photographed, but that's never an issue, as William is very good at distracting both children and grown ups and capturing expressions that really show them at their best.

Small or large family groups (up to 10), children, couples, pets, are all welcome, and so are any props that could enhance the portraits. A combination of groups, individuals, siblings, will be captured, in colour or black and white. We encourage requests!

There will be opportunities for breaks to change clothes, rest or have a drink; we really want everyone to enjoy their photo-shoot. 

We don't believe in hard sales. We have products suitable for all budgets and when it comes to selling, we tend to let the pictures do the talking! What matters is how proud you will be of your portraits.

name: Location Portrait Voucher
description:
THIS OFFER INCLUDES:

ONE FULL PHOTO-SHOOT, with full groups, sub groups and individuals at a location of your choice, within 25km of Gladstone.
    + 
A PERSONAL PREVIEW of your images, approximately one week later, at our Gladstone studio.
    + 
ONE 12” x 8” PRINT (approx. A4) or $50 off your portrait order.
    +
YOUR VERY OWN APP, for smartphone or tablet, with 12 of your portraits.

Your voucher will be posted to you in a presentation pack and must be used within 6 months of purchase.

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT THIS OFFER
Select your favourite spot within the Gladstone region (distance charges apply over 25km) and let awards-winning photographer William Debois capture loads of fun and creative images in a relaxed and playful way. He will make the most of the surrounding area and will ensure that everyone is having a good time so that both children and grown ups look their best in the photographs

Small or large family groups (up to 10), children, couples, pets, are all welcome, and so are any props that could enhance the portraits. A combination of groups, individuals, siblings, will be captured, in colour or black and white. We encourage requests!

There will be opportunities for breaks to change clothes, rest or have a drink; we really want everyone to enjoy their photo-shoot. 

You will need to visit our studio in Gladstone for your ordering session, but don’t worry, we don't believe in hard sales. We have products suitable for all budgets and when it comes to selling, we tend to let the pictures do the talking! What matters is how proud you will be of your portraits.

name: Gift certificates
description:
Our gift certificates allow family, friends or colleagues to apply pre-paid credits to their portrait order, either in combination with a photo-shoot voucher (see other products), or when purchasing images from a previous photo-shoot. If their order total exceeds the value of the vouchers, they can simply pay the difference on the day

Simply choose the value of the gift voucher you want to purchase and we will email it within two working days, together with your photo-shoot voucher if you have selected to buy one too. 

Make these certificates even more special by requesting a gift presentation pack to be posted to you or someone of your choice.

name: PhotoMosaic design + print
description:
Why say it with one picture when you can say it with one thousand?

A PhotoMosaïc tells your story like no other portrait, through a multitude of images assembled to create stunning wall art. Come close to your PhotoMosaïc and you can lose yourself in a thousand pictures, each capturing a moment unique to you, your family, your sports team or even your company staff. Step back and you will enjoy the full effect of the mosaïc, the most expressive of portraits, where each glance reveals something new.

We can create your very own PhotoMosaïc by combining one of your favourite high resolution images and a selection of the snapshots that have gathered on your cameraphone or computer over the years. Don't worry if you're not technically minded, we will assist you right from the start and get you involved throughout the creation process. 

Prices and sizes here are for prints only. Frame and canvas options are also available. Please 07497 25996 if you want to discuss your PhotoMosaic before making your purchase.

Why not make your PhotoMosaics extra special by integrating images from your Photopia Portraits studio or location photo-shoot?
